title: Helicone vs Comet: Which LLM Observability Should you Use?
title1: Helicone vs Comet: Which LLM Observability Should you Use?
title2: Helicone vs Comet: Which LLM Observability Should you Use?
description: Join us as we reflect on the past 6 months at Helicone, showcasing new features like Sessions, Prompt Management, Datasets, and more. Learn what's coming next and a heartfelt thank you for being part of our journey.
author: Cole Gottdank
